rooms.description: Modern and spacious entrance hall with built-in storage.
Large living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to maximize morning sunlight, adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Open-plan dining space adjacent to the living room with natural light and ventilation.
Functional kitchen designed for modern appliances and efficient workflow. Includes a window for ventilation on the south side as per local norms.
Luxurious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north wall to ensure privacy and natural light.
Cozy secondary bedroom with ample window space for light and air circulation.
Additional bedroom maintaining balance in design and layout as per Vastu principles.
A dedicated workspace with natural light from north-facing windows for concentration and minimal distractions.
Modern bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom, designed for privacy and ease of maintenance.
Compact utility room for household appliances and storage.

openings.description: Large main door with sliding mechanism to blend indoor-outdoor transition.

details.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows for maximum morning sunlight and ventilation.
Window for kitchen ventilation and additional light.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in master bedroom ensuring privacy and natural lighting.

notes: The design adheres to local building norms including adequate setbacks and ventilation requirements.
Vastu principles are applied: entrance in the north or east direction, placement of living spaces for maximum sunlight exposure, etc.
